body:
Comment 1: 
Reflection code is indeed messy and perhaps deserves a simpler interface.  However, 
unpacking the fields of the structure only helps a little; you'd still need to figure
out 
what type the field is.  It seems this aliasing of arrays and structs doesn't get to the
root 
of the problem.

We'll keep thinking about this.
_Status changed to **Thinking**._
